Token.Abstract: Sets the NSOperationQueue to be used for async operations.

Parameter.Name: operationQueue
Parameter.Abstract: The operation queue.

Token.Abstract: Gets the instance of the operation queue that will be used for async operations.
Sets the HTTP session manager.

Parameter.Name: httpSessionManager
Parameter.Abstract: A session manager instance.

Token.Abstract: Gets the HTTP session manager instance.
The root response element, if any.

ReturnValue.Abstract: The root response element, or nil.

Token.Abstract: The server's REST path for the instance type.

ReturnValue.Abstract: A string representing the server's REST path.

Token.Abstract: Gets all entities from the RESTPath endpoint.

Parameter.Name: completion
Parameter.Abstract: An optional completion block to be executed upon completion.

Token.Abstract: Gets a specific entity with an identifier, then serializes the response into CoreData.

Parameter.Name: identifier
Parameter.Abstract: The identifier (_id) of the entity.

Parameter.Name: completion
Parameter.Abstract: A block to be executed when the transaction completes.

Token.Abstract: Deletes the entities from the server.

Parameter.Name: entities
Parameter.Abstract: An array of NSManagedObject subclasses to delete.

Parameter.Name: completion
Parameter.Abstract: A completion block to be run when the transaction completes.

Token.Abstract: Updates the entity, then serializes the response into CoreData.

Parameter.Name: entity
Parameter.Abstract: The entity with updated values to be PUT.

Parameter.Name: completion
Parameter.Abstract: A completion block to be run when the transaction completes.

Token.Abstract: Updates the remote instance.

Parameter.Name: completion
Parameter.Abstract: A completion block to be executed on completion, or nil.

Token.Abstract: Creates a remnote entity at the specific path.

Parameter.Name: entityRepresentation
Parameter.Abstract: A disctionary representation of the entity.

Parameter.Name: path
Parameter.Abstract: The server's REST path to use when creating the object.

Parameter.Name: completion
Parameter.Abstract: A completion block to be executed on completion, or nil.

Token.Abstract: Creates a collection of entities at a specific path, then serializes the response to CoreData.

Parameter.Name: requestDictionaries
Parameter.Abstract: An array of NSDictionary object representations.

Parameter.Name: path
Parameter.Abstract: The path to POST the entities to.

Parameter.Name: params
Parameter.Abstract: Parameters to send along with the request.

Parameter.Name: completion
Parameter.Abstract: A completion block to be run when the transaction completes.

Token.Abstract: Creates a collection of entities at a specific path, then serializes the response to CoreData.

Parameter.Abstract: An array of NSDictionary object representations.

Parameter.Name: path
Parameter.Abstract: The path to POST the entities to.

Parameter.Name: params
Parameter.Abstract: Parameters to send along with the request.

Parameter.Name: progress
Parameter.Abstract: A progress block to be run when each operation completes.

Parameter.Name: completion
Parameter.Abstract: A completion block to be run when the transaction completes.

Token.Abstract: Create multiple remote entities using an array

Parameter.Name: requestDictionaries
Parameter.Abstract: An array of dictionaries representing objects to be created.

Parameter.Abstract: Parameters to send along with the request.

Parameter.Abstract: The operation queue to be used.

Parameter.Name: progress
Parameter.Abstract: A progress block to be run when each operation completes.

Parameter.Name: completion
Parameter.Abstract: A completion block to be run when the transaction completes.

Token.Abstract: Deletes a single entity.

Parameter.Abstract: The entity to delete.

Parameter.Name: completion
Parameter.Abstract: A completion block to be run when the transaction completes.

Token.Abstract: Deletes a collection of entities at a specific path, then serializes the response to CoreData.

Parameter.Name: completion
Parameter.Abstract: A completion block to be run when the transaction completes.

Token.Abstract: Gets a collection of entities at a specific path, then serializes the response to CoreData.

Parameter.Abstract: The path to GET the entities from.

Token.Abstract: Updates the supplied entity at a specific path.

Parameter.Abstract: The entity with updated values to be PUT.

Token.Abstract: Updated the remote entity.

Parameter.Name: entity
Parameter.Abstract: The entity to update.

Parameter.Name: path
Parameter.Abstract: The path to PUT the entities to.

Parameter.Name: uniqueID
Parameter.Abstract: A unique ID to be used when updating the entity.

Parameter.Name: parameters
Parameter.Abstract: A dictionary of query parameters to be sent with the request.

Parameter.Name: completion
Parameter.Abstract: A completion block to be run when the transaction completes.
